title: Philips SensoTouch Shaver How to replace ST3D shaver heads
description:
How to replace your SensoTouch 3D shaving heads?
This movie explains what is the replacement trigger and how does it work, how to change the shaving heads of your SensoTouch 3D shaver and how to reset the shaver after changing its shaving heads

asset.author: Philips
asset.hookText: How to replace your SensoTouch 3D shaving heads? This movie explains what is the replacement trigger and how does it work, how to change the shaving ...

transcripts:
Because shaving heads are subject to wear, they need to be replaced in order to maintain an optimal shaving performance. For maximum shaving performance, we advise you to replace the shaving head of your SensoTouch 3D, but only with an original RQ 12 Philips shaving head. 

Some of the SensoTouch 3D models will indicate when to replace its shaving heads by displaying its symbol. This is called the replacement reminder. The replacement reminder will be repeated after each shave until you reset it manually. 

The shaving unit was designed so it could easily be pulled off. So please don't try to turn it. Once the old unit is off, click in the new unit on the shaver. 

To reset the replacement reminder, simply press and hold the on/off button for more than 10 seconds. The reminder will turn off. And it will then restart monitoring the status of your shaving heads and will remind you when it's time to replace them again.
